SafeCrocodile - Class in model
New class representing a safe crocodile that can be used as a ride for the frog to cross the river.

New class that allows us to implement compareTo method.

ScoreController - Class in controller
New class that uses ScoreModel to implement read method.

New class that uses ScoreBoardInput to create an arrayList.

ScoreView - Class in view
New class that extends Pane.
ScoreView() - Constructor for class view.ScoreView
Constructor to set layout and style of text Call method setScoreFont and setShadow Creates binding on the text property of the label to the score so that the label always displays the score
setAnimation(Image[], int) - Method in class model.AnimatedObject
Allows us to set the different states of each actor as well as change their speed
setEmpty() - Method in class model.End
Used to change the image of the end to an empty end.
setFrogLives(int) - Static method in class controller.LivesController
Set the number of lives for the frog
setMainStage(Stage) - Static method in class controller.MenuController
Used to set the mainStage.

New class representing a snake that appears on the median depending on game levels.

start(Stage) - Method in class game.Main
 
states - Variable in class model.AnimatedObject
Array of images representing the states of the actors
stopAllGameAudio() - Static method in class controller.AudioController
Allows us to stop all the game audio
stopMenuAudio() - Static method in class controller.AudioController
Before playing the game audio we have to stop the menu audio from playing We can do so by calling this method
